logFinder.name: Java Util Logger
logFinder.description: Add 'if' statements before Java Util Logger method calls

option.name: FINEST
option.enabledPreview: log.finest("Simple message"); if (log.isLoggable(Level.FINEST)) log.finest("Complex message: " + this);
